data.actual_result: The camera will stay with it's orientation in portrait mode, making it impossible to get that beautiful picture.
data.expected_result: The camera's orientation will change to lanscape.
data.short_description: Rotating you screen from portrait to landscape with the inapp camera open will keep the camera orientation in portrait.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the inapp camera via the plus button - Turn your phone from portrait to landscape
